alert.note: Alert for East Laramie County; Goshen County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 3:49AM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Niobrara County, Goshen County and East Laramie County. In Nebraska, Box Butte County, Scotts Bluff County, Banner County, Morrill County, Kimball County, Cheyenne County and Southern Sioux County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: East Laramie County; Goshen County; Niobrara County
